result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Appeal of Eligibility Determination for Appoint of Counsel
Defendant not eligible for court appointed counsel through Dane County - income over established guideline.

Defendant appeared.  Kyle Olsen appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defn previously applied for SPD and does not qualify. Defn interested in CDP. CT sets over PTC and directs defn to complete CDP application process prior to the next court date. Notice of hearing handed out in court.

Defendant here today at Collections window to apply for county appointed attorney - to return with completed Petition for Counsel, bring along SPD Financial Eligibility Worksheet and provide most recent paystub.
Pre-trial conference on September 12, 2022 at 09:15 am.
Pre-trial conference on July 21, 2022 at 09:30 am.

Your signature bond is set in the amount of $500 per case. You may be responsible for paying this amount if you miss a court date or do not follow conditions of your release. 
- Defendant shall not have any contact, direct or indirect, with AGM. 
- Defendant shall not possess any type of dangerous weapon [as defined by Wis. Stat. 939.22(10)]. 
- Defendant shall not possess any pellet/BB gun. 
- Defendant shall not possess any type of facsimile weapon. 
Trial Judge - Br 5

09:02 AM Defendant appeared.  Colleen Lennon appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  The defendant was advised regarding their right to an attorney and to the SPD application process if not already represented. Defendant received a copy of the Complaint and waived reading. Court entered Not Guilty pleas as to any misdemeanor counts.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 21, 2022 at 09:30 am.
